title: "INL researching machine learning for infrastructure utilization"
excerpt: "Researchers at the Idaho National Laboratory (INL) are using machine learning to teach computers how to recognize utility infrastructure from photographs, including satellite imagery. INL researcher Ashley Shields explains how INL’s critical infrastructure mapping tool uses Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations (LIME) data to make decisions,"
